word_copy.title: Word copying tutor
word_copy.COMMENT: This tutor is designed for copying words.

point on the first letter of the word
show box on first edit group
on completion of animation, make the replay glyph disappear

DICTATION_REPLAY_BEHAVIOR.COMMENT: prompt when user hesitates when they should be writing.

tracks.name: PLAY - Write the missing letter in

GENERAL_CORRECT_BEHAVIOR.COMMENT: Do this when they get a character correct

tracks.name: Hide Sample for current index - correct
increment the current letter index(letter level feedback).
deactivate edit mode for the word
update the response colors for each letter in word
update the response colors for each letter in word
deactivate edit mode for the word

ITEM_COMPLETE_BEHAVIOR.COMMENT: The data item - letter/word/sentence is finished

tracks.name: update the response colors for sentence
WAIT on Error - sentence writing activities.

DEMO_COMPLETE_BEHAVIOR.COMMENT: The demo data item - letter/word/sentence is finished

GENERAL_ERROR_BEHAVIOR.COMMENT: Do this when they make a mistake

tracks.name: update the response color for the word
prompt - Please fix the wrong word
update the response colors for sentence
update the response color for the word
initial sentence incorrect prompt
tracks.soundsource: Sorry, what you wrote is not correct.mp3

tracks.name: Activate the edit mode for the sentence
release SEN_ATTEMPT_1 update the sentence attempt features
update the response color for the word
update the response color for the word
prompt - MAKE IT LOOK...
tracks.soundsource: Try to make it look more like this.mp3

tracks.name: update the response colors for each letter in word
update the response colors for each letter in word
update the response colors for each letter in word
update the response colors for each letter in word
update the response colors for each letter in word

leave space
tracks.soundsource: We leave one space between words.mp3

REPLAY_TUTORIAL_GLYPH_BEHAVIOR.COMMENT: Show the glyph animation and disappear

tracks.name: Letter Ripple Prototype without updating response
when animation ends, DO NOT reset no, but resume hesitation and erase animation glyph.

MERCY_RULE_BEHAVIOR.COMMENT: Do this when they've made too many mistakes

tracks.name: DO BETTER NEXT TIME - Feedback
tracks.soundsource: Next time you can do better.mp3

tracks.name: audio - This is how you should write
tracks.soundsource: This is how you should write.mp3

tracks.name: audio - space
tracks.soundsource: There should be a space here.mp3

tracks.name: when animation ends, reset and resume hesitation.
increment the current letter index(letter level feedback).

CHAR_ERROR_BEHAVIOR.COMMENT: wrong character was selected by recognizer

RESUME_HESITATION_AFTER_REPLAY.COMMENT: Does three things- 1) Erases the animation glyph. 2) posts a delayed hesitation feedback call (postNamed) 3) sets a volatile behavior for START_WRITING to cancel hesitation number

START_HESITATION_ON_STOP_WRITING.COMMENT: Does two things- 1) posts a delayed hesitation feedback call(postNamed) 2) sets a volatile behavior for START_WRITING to cancel and reset hesitation number

START_HESITATION_ON_MERCY_COMPLETE.COMMENT: Does three things- 1) cancels the mercy behavior node 2) posts a delayed hesitation feedback call(postNamed) 3) sets a volatile behavior for START_WRITING to cancel and reset hesitation number

tracks.name: postNamed - HESITATION_PROMPT - APPLY_BEHAVIOR - INPUT_HESITATION_FEEDBACK called from START_HESITATION_ON_MERCY_COMPLETE

NEXTITEM.COMMENT: This node presents a word for user to copy.

CORRECT.COMMENT: When user inputs a correct answer...

WRONG.COMMENT: When user inputs an incorrect answer...

UNRECOGNIZED.COMMENT: When the recognizer fails to identify the input...

NEXTSCENE.COMMENT: When module is complete - move to next scene in the scenegraph
